import axios from"axios";export default{// Topic API
getTopics:function getTopics(){return axios.get("/api/topics");},getTopic:function getTopic(id){return axios.get("/api/topics/"+id);},deleteTopic:function deleteTopic(id){return axios.delete("/api/topics/"+id);},saveTopic:function saveTopic(topicData){return axios.post("/api/topics",topicData);},// User API
getUsers:function getUsers(){return axios.get("/api/users");},getUser:function getUser(id){return axios.get("/api/users/"+id);},deleteUser:function deleteUser(id){return axios.delete("/api/users/"+id);},saveUser:function saveUser(userData){return axios.post("/api/users",userData);},// Review API
getReviews:function getReviews(){return axios.get("/api/reviews");},getReview:function getReview(id){return axios.get("/api/reviews/"+id);},deleteReview:function deleteReview(id){return axios.delete("/api/reviews/"+id);},saveReview:function saveReview(reviewData){return axios.post("/api/reviews",reviewData);}};
